name: Stress Test (Duck Bear)
description:
Made for the Bullet Hell game jam hosted by: Harman Kamboj and SkyanSam

Stress Test is a bullet hell with three different gamemodes and multiple bosses

CONTROLS

Stress Test can be played with a keyboard and mouse or a controller, to use controller you must toggle it in game.

KEYBOARD - WASD/Arrow Keys to move, Shift to dash, Left Click to shoot, Right Click to use your power move

CONTROLLER - rotate Left Stick to move, Left Bumper to dash, Right Bumper to shoot, press the A to use your power move

3 GAMEMODES

The game contains 3 gamemodes at this current time

  • INFINITE - Enemies constantly spawn with time
  • ROUNDS - Enemies spawn in a wave system
  • BOSS RUSH - Bosses spawn one after another

DIFFICULTIES

  • EASY
  • MEDIUM
  • HARD
  • CHALLENGE

POWER UPS

  • FUSE - Gain a life point
  • GEAR - Increase rate of fire
  • OIL CAN - Increase speed
  • DOUBLE POINTS - Score multiplier for limited time

CLOSING STATEMENTS

Thank you for looking at the game page and possibly downloading the game, as that means a lot to me; I appreciate everyone who leaves a comment, checks out the page, or downloads and tries the game
